validations.errorHandling:
move  ws-env-lines   to ws-lines
     end-if
     subtract 1 from ws-lines giving ws-23-lines

move  "Detail" to l6-type
              move space to l6-ledger
     end-if
     if       line-cnt > 70
              perform headings

move  "Detail" to l6-type
              move space to l6-ledger
     end-if
     if       line-cnt > 70
              perform headings
